text: Sadiqabad railway station (Urdu and ) is located in Sadiqabad city, Rahim Yar Khan district of Punjab province, Pakistan. ==See also== * List of railway stations in Pakistan * Pakistan Railways * old station ==References== ==External links== * Official Web Site of Pakistan Railways Category:Railway stations in Rahim Yar Khan District Category:Railway stations on Karachi–Peshawar Line (ML 1)
title: Sadiqabad railway station
